string.value: The Roswell Field is prone to aliens appearances, so this place is under constant watch. The attack is still on, so I suggest you and others not get too comfortable here. I'll have to head back to the Sector for some more work, so I'll see you around!

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that helped me get rid of #b#o4230116##k here at the Coolan Field. It feels good to find someone like you here at a place where dangerous aliens are a common sight. string.name: name
string.value: Mrs. Claus

string.name: n0
string.value: Where is my husband?

string.name: n1
string.value: Do you believe in Santa Claus?

string.name: d0
string.value: Need any help?

string.name: d1
string.value: Nobody's sewing skills are on par with mine! Not even close!

string.name: d0
string.value: The outside world is so much better than what I imagined in my egg!

string.name: d1
string.value: Master, if I'm by your side, I'll go anywhere. Anywhere!
Heh, I can defeat a pig with a single toenail! I am a dragon, you know.
I'm so weak from hunger, I couldn't even defeat a pig. The pig would probably end up eating me... I feel so weak...
Look for the word 'impossible' in the dictionary and you'll see a picture of a Dragon eating grass. I refuse to eat it. It's gross! Bleh!
Ugh... My stomach... I feel sick.
Dad probably knows something that can help us! Huh? It's weird that I call him Dad? But what else would I call him? Your dad is my dad, Master.
The Dairy Cow might be a little scary... Just saying...
Ah, so full. Hmm, didn't Dad say he wanted to tell us something?
Yeah, that explanation was a little wordy. To sum it up, you and I share the same destiny.
Ha! Strange Pigs aren't so different from normal Pigs. I can defeat them with one wing tied behind my back.
Haha, I defeated the Strange Pigs! I'm awesome! We better go tell Dad!
So this is what a town looks like. Wow! So many people... And they're all so busy!
So this is what helping people is all about!
Let's help people who are in trouble! I'm sure this town is full of folk who need help.
Train! Train! Traaain! Choo choo! Let's train, Master!
Power B. Fore, from the Hill East of Henesys... Strange name...
Eh, that Power B. Fore guy is kind of a weirdo.
Cynical Orange Mushrooms! Cynical Orange Mushrooms! What does 'cynical' mean anyway?
Master, I'm getting booored...
What kind of oddball would raise Spores? Seriously...
Ribbon Pigs? Bah! They'll topple to the ground if I just poke them with my pinky.
You and I are heroes, Master! What? That deed wasn't significant enough to make us heroes? Psh, big or small, it's the thought that counts. Let's just call ourselves heroes!
Everyone in town knows the Master! Awesome!
Whoa, this puppet has some seriously bad mojo. You feel it?
If he's snoozing here, then who's standing guard?
A guard isn't as impressive as a hero, but it's still an important job. Of course, I'd love to do it. Besides, who says we can't be both?
Argh! I hate to leave things hanging. I need closure. I won't be able to rest until we catch the culprit. Nella better contact us soon!
Of course I'm curious about me, but I'm more curious about my race. Where are all the other dragons?
Onyx Dragons... Where are they? They have to be around somewhere...
A talking puppet! How bizarre! What? It's bizarre to hear a dragon talk? No, it's not. You're silly!
I'm so glad we cleared up Sabitrama's misunderstanding. Only morons jump to conclusions. What do you mean I do it all the time?
Hmm, that puppet is actually very nice. I didn't expect that.
The folks in your hometown don't know you very well, Master. Not nearly as well as I do. It's kind of sad...
Phew, I'm so glad everything turned out okay. What a relief!
That door with the puppet on it is a big problem. What can we do? Hmm...
Heheheh. That was remarkably heroic, if I do say so myself.
A secret organization of people who do good deeds? Awesome! I'll be like one of those superheroes that hide their identities. Bat-Mir! Mir-verine! IronMir! Oooh, I really want to join!
This organization is truly secretive. It's hard to join, because it's so selective!
Since I gave you one of my precious scales, we'd better find out more about Onyx Dragons.
Onyx Dragons are extinct...? But why? How?
No. How can Onyx Dragons be extinct when I'm right here? Uh-uh. There have to be other Onyx Dragons somewhere!
Yay, we're in! We're in! We're part of the secret organization!
This secret organization is more secretive than I imagined... What's the point of being so secretive when you're just helping other people?
A clue about Onyx Dragons? Let's ask, Master! Right now!
Go, go, go! To Lith Harbor! To John! He might know something about my race!
I can't wait to find others like me!
Another super secret mission from a super secret organization...
Hmm, how is that strange creature, Shammos, related to the secret organization? I can't figure it out.
Let's rush to that island where the dragons live, Master!
At least now I know there's another dragon out there. I can wait longer if I have to. We'll be reunited someday. I just know it.
Ah, so the mystery of the secret organization is revealed! Sort of... But there's still so much I don't understand.
I've got a bad feeling about this mission. Is it all in my head?
What the... It's our fourth mission and we're still only temporary members?
Something... Something just isn't right...
What in the world just happened?! I don't understand what's going on...
That Dragon talked to me! I'm sure of it!
Master, I wasn't able to look into his memory. Tell me! Tell me!
Those Black Wings... They tricked us! They destroyed my species! I will never forgive them...

string.name: n0

string.name: n1

string.name: d0

string.value: Hey, how have you been? Thanks to you, I can now live out the remaining days of my life in peace. All I want to do now is study things in life.

string.name: n0
string.value: An old friend of mine is suddenly nowhere to be found... I wonder how she's doing these days...

string.name: n1
string.value: I've been investigating around town lately and found some very interesting facts in the process...

string.name: d0
string.value: I've been studying the geography of this island for a long time, and I still don't know a lot of things. I need more data. Anyway, I'm worried about this friend of mine in Orbis who disappeared out of the blue one day. I wonder what happened to her.

string.name: d1
string.value: I have no clue where Hella may be, or what she is doing, but I'm sure she's doing just fine there. I'll be fine here, waiting for the day when I see her again.

string.name: n0

string.value: Monsters have been getting much more ferocious lately. It's gotten to the point where I am worried about getting killed out there. I used to go hunt down a number of yetis a day, but those days are now over. I'm old.

string.name: d1
string.value: Monsters have been getting much more ferocious lately. It's gotten to the point where I am worried about getting killed out there. I used to go hunt down a number of yetis a day, but those days are now over. I'm old.

string.name: s0

string.value: I am #b#p2030002##k of Alpha Platoon. I made a forced landing here after an accident. I'm concerned for the safety of the other members, but I believe they're safe.

string.value: Hey, what's going on? Have you tried using the stuff I gave you the other day? That item had some experimental elements to it, and therefore it's a little dangerous, but it was fun making something I've always wanted to make. I have to get back to work now!

string.name: n0

string.value: Oh no, it must be the monsters again. As soon as I fix this, they come rushing back and break it again. Hey, how long have you been there? string.value: Tsk, tsk... I'll be late if I don't get going!

string.name: n1
string.value: As long as I am here, this place is safe!

string.value: Where is Mirol...?

string.name: n1
string.value: I'm getting tired of going on missions every day.

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm #b#p2050006##k of the Omega Sector, currently on a secret mission. You look like a traveler, and even though you seem to be on our side, I can't divulge any information regarding my mission.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that brought #b#p2050001#'s#k #b#t4031100##k here and showed it to me. I can't thank you enough for that. How's the robot coming along? I can't wait for the day I get to have my hands on that robot. Now I need to get back to work...

string.value: The weather is just perfect outside. This place is secure and protected from the aliens. It's been awfully quiet these past few days, which troubles me, but I can't stand pat. Oh, by the way, the work you did for me the other day, that's going great now.

string.value: Jr. Officer Medin

string.name: n0
string.value: I've studied a lot, but I don't have real working experience yet.

string.value: Red medicine should take care of most injuries.

string.name: d0
string.value: Please be careful of your every act here in the Omega Sector. How can I help you? My name is #b#p2050010##k, and as you can see, I take care of the wounded here. I'm always on my toes, in case aliens attack.

string.name: d1
string.value: Please be careful of your every act here in the Omega Sector. How can I help you? My name is #b#p2050010##k, and as you can see, I take care of the wounded here. I'm always on my toes, in case aliens attack.

string.value: *Sigh.* I wish I could go outside and defeat the aliens myself, but I'm stuck doing work in the headquarters. I'm confident that I can do a good job too. When can I go out and fight them...?

string.value: *Sigh.* I wish I could go outside and defeat the aliens myself, but I'm stuck doing work in the headquarters. I'm confident that I can do a good job too. When can I go out and fight them...?

string.value: Hello there. string.name: n0
string.value: What a gorgeous day!

string.name: n1
string.value: Press the Alt key to jump.

string.name: n2

string.name: s2
string.value: How's is going?

string.name: b0
string.value: Whoa. You look kind of lost.

string.name: c0
string.value: Argh, my beautiful skin...

string.name: d0
string.value: You must be new! Allow me to help. To move, use the #bleft and right arrows#k. To jump, press the #bAlt#k key. To speak to NPCs, simply click on them. Easy, right? Oh, sometimes you'll have to climb ladders or ropes. To do so, simply use the #bup arrow#k next to the object you want to climb!

string.name: d1
string.value: Now I can check my skin. Whew! It looks just fine.

string.name: n0
string.value: I'll show you a great dance.

string.name: n1
string.value: Do you want to know about the 'Sand Bandits?' Look into it for yourself.

string.name: d0
string.value: Just dancing well is not enough for me. I want to do a marvelous, brilliant dance!

string.name: d1
string.value: The queen only cares about jewelry. She knows nothing about dance even though everyone in Ariant thinks dancing is important.

string.name: n0
string.value: I want to see my sister.

string.name: n1
string.value: I am afraid of the queen's face.

string.name: d0
string.value: I really miss my sister. Why did the queen take her? She's innocent...

string.name: d1
string.value: Unless the queen releases my sister... I'll join the Sand Bandits and rescue her.

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't speak to me.

string.name: n1
string.value: Why do you keep staring at me?

string.name: d0
string.value: Stay away from me, or risk the consequences.

string.name: d1
string.value: Is it faster to assassinate the queen than to steal her treasure? If my leader lets me, I will assassinate her...

string.name: n0
string.value: ...What are you staring at?

string.name: n1
string.value: Sand can't be scattered without wind.

string.name: d0
string.value: I don't have the time to talk to you... In fact, I am not as free as you think.

string.name: d1
string.value: The 'Sand Bandits' are still weak. What else do we need to be stronger...?

string.name: n0
string.value: It is my honor to protect the palace.

string.name: n1
string.value: Hm... Do you have a Lidium gemstone?

string.name: d0
string.value: A beard is a symbol of masculinity! There isn't another beard as nice as mine!

string.name: d1
string.value: Don't underestimate us guardians! It's a great honor to protect entrance of the palace! I'd bet my beard on it!

string.name: n0
string.value: Desert people are too careful.

string.name: n1
string.value: I want to study every culture in the world!

string.name: d0
string.value: Isn't this turban cool? It seems to make me understand Ariant culture well.

string.name: d1
string.value: Ariant is the most interesting place I have been ever. I guess I can write interesting stories about this territory.

string.value: Le Petit Prince

string.name: n0
string.value: I cannot see the stars.

string.name: n1
string.value: I want to make friends.

string.name: d0

string.name: d1
string.value: I'm really glad to have a friend. The barren desert looks beautiful because of you.

string.name: n0
string.value: Are there no more beautiful jewels?

string.name: n1
string.value: Only dazzling beauty satisfies me.

string.name: d0
string.value: Those desert people are filthy. The only good thing about them is their ability to work Lidium.

string.name: d1
string.value: I need more beautiful, more precious, more special jewelry filled with magical power!

string.name: n0
string.value: Once upon a time...

string.name: n1
string.value: And Aladdin rubbed the magic lamp...

string.name: d0
string.value: I wonder how Jiyur has been... What if Jiyur is hurt? Even though the Sand Bandits protect him.

string.name: d1
string.value: The heroes of old were brave. I see that same brilliant bravery in you.

string.name: n1
string.value: Hmm... Hmm...

string.name: d0
string.value: It is strange to always be so tired. It is irritating to even open my eyes... When did I get like this?

string.name: d1
string.value: Huge desert... Barren but rich desert... They'll be fine without their king.

string.name: n0
string.value: Hm... Do you have business here?

string.name: n1
string.value: You'd better be careful of what you say... It's dangerous here...

string.name: d0
string.value: Not just anyone can join the Sand Bandits. We don't look kindly on reckless initiates.

string.name: d1
string.value: We can't rest until Ariant is free.

string.name: n0
string.value: Huh! The queen is blinded by greed... It might be dangerous to say things like that.

string.name: n1
string.value: If you're not with us, leave! It's too dangerous for you here.

string.name: d0
string.value: Sh! Be quiet! What if a guardian notices you?

string.name: d1
string.value: Though it's in the desert, Ariant was once rich thanks to Lidium... This is all the queen's fault.

string.name: n0

string.name: n1
string.value: I need to gather more comrades.

string.value: How can I steal the queen's treasure...

string.value: True Alchemy is associated with magical power.

string.name: n1
string.value: This place is Zenumist, for alchemists seeking pure alchemy.

string.name: d0
string.value: Tradition yields great power. Since the Black Magician Age, only Zenumist have kept developing alchemy.

string.name: d1
string.value: Alchemy and alchemist... Both are important. But more important than that is Magatia's tolerance of us. I must protect the honor of Magatia.

string.name: func
string.value: Alcadno President

string.name: n0
string.value: It is foolish to judge them by their looks.

string.name: n1
string.value: Pure alchemy has its limits. If you want to exceed your limits, join Alcadno.

string.name: d0
string.value: Zenumist... I know what they say. They don't like merging life energy with machines. They're simply afraid! Seeking pure alchemy won't lead to the future.

string.name: d1
string.value: Nobody knows what's more important yet. Who knows which of us is right? Who knows how to choose between a correct lie and a foolish truth...?

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. De Lang

string.name: d0
string.value: Isn't it wrong...?

string.name: d1
string.value: This experiment might be wrong... But I can't give up. For her and Keeny.

string.name: name
string.value: Humanoid A

string.name: n0
string.value: I wish to smell a flower at least once...

string.name: n1
string.value: Where are you from? Not from a beaker, are you...?

string.name: d0
string.value: Are my emotions real? Or just an illusion caused by mechanical error?

string.name: d1
string.value: I want to be human... With a warm heart... Then... I can hold her hands.

string.name: n0
string.value: Isn't it so beautiful? Even though it's animated by alchemy.

string.name: n1
string.value: It is lucky for use to have Keeny. How bad it would be without Keeny...

string.name: d0
string.value: Even though alchemists and fairies have antipathy for each other, I can remain in this town because the Zenumist president has been protecting us.

string.name: d1
string.value: I used to live in Orbis. It was pleasant to walk in cloud park with my brother.

string.name: n0
string.value: Keeny loves learning Alchemy!

string.name: n1
string.value: *Cough!* Ah... I can't stop coughing...

string.name: d0
string.value: Almost all Magatians are alchemists. Everyone concentrates on alchemy. So... Magatia is always quiet.

string.name: d1
string.value: Keeny like Humanoid! I can feel warmth from Humanoid A's eyes.

string.name: d0
string.value: *Gulp* Why are there only Ghosts around here...?

string.name: d1

string.value: Han the Broker

string.name: n0
string.value: Deal secretly and clearly.

string.name: n1
string.value: For the right price, I'll get you whatever you want.

string.name: d0
string.value: Hm... Don't doubt me just because I'm a back street broker. I deal in trust... And I keep up my credit.

string.name: d1
string.value: I've been in Magatia for a while... I know everything that has happened in Magatia except for that case.

string.name: n0
string.value: The magical formula to make the core is so difficult.

string.name: n1
string.value: Why does Alcadno stick to machines like that?

string.name: d0
string.value: Make your position clear! Are you Zenumist or Alcadno?

string.name: d1
string.value: Not everything can be justified. Machines can never be human.

string.name: n0
string.value: Did you know that elixir's main ingredient is the eye of a Curse Eye?

string.name: n1
string.value: Only the Zenumists are real alchemists, but... They are too conservative and boring.

string.name: d0
string.value: Alcadno certainly don't count... Heheheh... Fools cannot see the important things...

string.name: d1
string.value: The Zenumists' studies are respectable... But it is too difficult to be used by everyone... Compared with Zenumist, Alcadno is more useful... Why doesn't Zenumist want to admit this?

string.value: Blondie is my blonde kitty cat.

string.name: d0
string.value: Isn't it a wonderful day?

string.name: d1
string.value: Blondie is the coolest cat I've ever had.

string.name: name
string.value: Village Chief Malek

string.name: n0
string.value: Coconut juice really helps you cool off when it's hot!

string.name: n1
string.value: Soothing music makes life in Kampung Village is great!

string.name: d0
string.value: Welcome, visitors. I'm Malek, the chief of the nearby Kampung Village.

string.name: d1
string.value: All these tourists are making my town a better place... With their money!

string.name: n0
string.value: It seems like I've been stuck here forever.

string.name: n1
string.value: I have some dream places to visit.

string.name: d0
string.value: It's nice to live an old-fashioned lifestyle in Kampung, but...

string.name: d1
string.value: I want to see what's outside of this village,

string.name: n0
string.value: Need any potions?

string.name: n1
string.value: I have all you need here.

string.value: Local Specialties

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Moneybags

string.name: n0
string.value: Hey! Happy New Year!

string.name: n1
string.value: I wonder who can bring me some red envelopes...

string.value: Cai Shen

string.name: n0
string.value: Come test your luck with Gachapon!

string.name: n1
string.value: Who knows? You may get a nice item!

string.name: d1
string.value: I can only make these Dumplings and Long Thread Moss Soups at random every 12 hours. So if you want more, come back to me 12 hours after receiving these dishes.

string.name: name
string.value: Guan Zhong

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm Guan Zhong, the Prime Minister of Qi. Have you heard of 'The Friendship of Guan and Bao?' That's my story. Haha.

string.name: n1
string.value: You wish to unlock the seal? I'm the one you should look for!

string.name: n2
string.value: You wish to have the key to unlock the seal? I can help you!

string.name: d1
string.value: Sharing... A word that warms my heart. I hope you understand what I mean...

string.name: name
string.value: Sima Qian

string.name: n0
string.value: Have you seen my history book? I'm Sima Qian, the historian.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please take good care of your account!

string.name: d1
string.value: I can only make these steamed fish and roasted chickens at random every 12 hours. So if you want more, come back to me 12 hours after receiving these dishes.

string.name: name
string.value: Zhang Liang

string.name: n0

string.name: n1
string.value: Take extra care to prevent your account from being stolen!

string.name: n2
string.value: You can't drop, trade, or sell sealed items.

string.name: d1

string.name: n0

string.name: d0
string.value: Life is a learning process, or so I was told. Do you think cleaning is part of that learning?

string.name: d1
string.value: Life is a learning process, or so I was told. Do you think cleaning is part of that learning?

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't run around in the temple. You'll get a scolding!

string.name: n1
string.value: When will big brother and master return?

string.name: func
string.value: Golden Temple Guard

string.name: d0
string.value: SnowFro the Fruitnificent appears quite often here. Please be careful.

string.name: d1
string.value: SnowFro the Fruitnificent appears quite often here. Please be careful.

string.name: n0
string.value: This is dangerous place.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please return to the temple, where it's safe.

string.name: func
string.value: The Praying Girl

string.name: d0
string.value: *Mumbles* I must do my best.

string.name: d1
string.value: *Mumbles* I must do my best.

string.name: n0
string.value: Awimoweh... Awimoweh...

string.name: n1
string.value: The legendary SnowFro has appeared...

string.name: func
string.value: General Store

string.name: d0
string.value: I used to be big-time! I was gonna be in pictures, kung-fuing all over the big screen. Now I'm stuck here...

string.name: d1
string.value: I used to be big-time! I was gonna be in pictures, kung-fuing all over the big screen. Now I'm stuck here...

string.name: n0
string.value: Coming all the way here... you are pretty impressive.

string.name: n1
string.value: Why am I here? *Chuckles* Don't worry about it.

string.name: name
string.value: Mr. Yoo

string.name: func
string.value: Golden Temple Tour Guide

string.name: d0
string.value: This is now a dangerous place for traveling. It would be best if you went back.

string.name: d1
string.value: This is now a dangerous place for traveling. It would be best if you went back.

string.name: n0
string.value: Be careful, this is a dangerous place for traveling.

string.name: n1
string.value: Please hurry and prepare to leave.

string.name: name
string.value: Ms. Tang

string.name: n0
string.value: *Sigh.* It's not a good day for business.

string.name: n1
string.value: Ask me anything you'd like!

string.name: n0
string.value: Would you like to leave this place?

string.name: n1
string.value: If you would like to leave this place, talk to me.

string.name: func
string.value: Golden Temple Guard

string.name: n0
string.value: *Spark!* I am cybernetic automaton model T-1337. BZZ!

string.name: n1
string.value: I have been sent to... CRITICAL SYSTEM ERROR! *Blue Screen.*

string.name: d0
string.value: *Spark!* I am cybernetic automaton model T-1337. BZZ!

string.name: d1
string.value: I have been sent to... CRITICAL SYSTEM ERROR! *Blue Screen.*

string.name: n0
string.value: Zzz... Zzz...

string.name: n1
string.value: Can I help you?

string.name: d0
string.value: I have pride and respect. That is especially important for people like us.

string.name: d1
string.value: I have pride and respect. That is especially important for people like us.

string.name: n1
string.value: What do you think is hiding under the shadows?

string.name: d0
string.value: What brings you here?

string.name: d1
string.value: Long time no see, rookie.

string.name: n0
string.value: I'm worried about Syl... I mean, Lady Syl.

string.name: n1
string.value: Hiya! I'm in the middle of training right now...

string.name: d0
string.value: Focus! Hah!

string.name: d1
string.value: Syl... I mean, Lady Syl hasn't been sleeping much. I'm worried about her.

string.name: n1
string.value: Coo coo coo coo!

string.name: d1
string.value: Coo?! Coo!

string.name: name
string.value: Former Dark Lord

string.name: n0
string.value: I've only got myself to blame...

string.name: n1
string.value: My child... I wish she'd find her smile again...

string.name: d0
string.value: Are you here to seek the truth?

string.name: d1
string.value: Please, help my child...and him.

string.name: name
string.value: Anonymous Sender

string.name: n1
string.value: What do you think is hiding under the shadows?

string.name: d0
string.value: What brings you here?

string.name: d1
string.value: Long time no see, rookie.

string.name: n0
string.value: Coo coo?!

string.name: n1
string.value: Coo coo coo coo coo coo coo COO!!!!

string.name: d0
string.value: Coo coo!!

string.name: d1
string.value: Coo coo?! COO!!

string.name: d0
string.value: Arggh!! I'm sooo busy! And why do I get piled with even more stuff when I'm so busy?!

string.name: d1
string.value: Resolved somehow... I guess?

string.name: name
string.value: The Dark Lord's Diary

string.name: d0
string.value: (This diary is rather mysterious... who drew all these unicorns in here?)

string.name: d1
string.value: (This diary is rather mysterious... who drew all these unicorns in here?)

string.name: name
string.value: Mu Young's Storage

string.name: d0
string.value: (Barrels full of stuff... Looks like Mu Young is one unorganized fellow.)

string.name: d1
string.value: (Barrels full of stuff... Looks like Mu Young is one unorganized fellow.)

string.name: n0
string.value: Lalalala lalala lalala!

string.name: n1
string.value: It's coming... it's coming... I got it! The beautiful melody...

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm a bard of Leafre. I play beautiful music.

string.name: d1
string.value: Music is played with your heart... Not with your looks!

string.name: func
string.value: Blue Trooper Captain

string.name: n0
string.value: Grrr... Those Red Dragon Turtles...

string.name: n1
string.value: We shall fight until we win!

string.name: d0
string.value: Grrr... When did this battle begin...?

string.name: d1
string.value: The battle will not end... Not until we wipe out every single Red Dragon Turtle. Grrr!

string.value: Red Trooper Captain

string.name: n0
string.value: Fight! It's a war!

string.name: n1
string.value: Destroy the Blue Dragon Turtles! Eradicate them!

string.name: d0

string.value: If your item inventory is full, you won't be able to take in new items. You should take care of the unimportant ones by either discarding them or selling them at a store.

string.name: f2
